location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at Tahran [Tehran]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the state of currency exchange at Bushire and Bussora [Basra], for the purpose of fulfilling bills from Tehran. It explains that it can be very difficult to acquire even small sums, unless there is an immediate prospect of a ship departing for India.
